html:
11.28.23  2:44 pm   What, in your opinion, is the weirdest song you've made?

      i have never made a weird song

11.28.23  2:30 pm   Hey! I have auditions for cruise ships coming up. I don't know whether I'll get in or which line I would get on if I did. What is your experience working as a musician on cruise ships, and do you have any tips for auditioning? 

      i've never done that sort of thing. but what i recommend for auditions in general, is to do auditions more often. if you do it often, you will get very good at it and you won't worry about it. the only problem is, if you get too good, someone will give you a job and then you won't have time to do auditions anymore

11.28.23  2:02 pm   just wondering do you know other languages than english?

      almost

      i suspect so

      the bad news is no, the good news is i don't think that's what you really want

      no

      how did you figure out that that fact was a fact

11.28.23  1:21 am   What's the smallest weird number?

      .0000000.......1

11.28.23  12:27 am   you are very good at making things that make me feel things. Sometimes the feeling of feeling those things feels like something really really special (even if the feeling itself doesnt feel like that). why does that feel so special? and does it go both ways? do you feel something about when youre making things or feel something about what youre feeling?

      i think you probably sense on some level the honesty with which i am persuing an infinite pursuit

11.27.23  10:55 pm   how do I imagine better? 

      that depends how you've been doing it so far

11.27.23  9:52 pm   what is a song that helps you not take things too seriously

      songs don't help me take things not seriously. if it's any good, or works well in its placement, i freak out and get very serious about it. however, if it's not good, i also freak out and get serious about what may have gone wrong

11.27.23  7:03 pm   Is this question a paragraph? Does it need 5 sentences to be a paragraph?

      in my opinion, when standing on its own, it becomes a paragraph when it takes up multiple lines without using linebreaks (return/enter). however, i believe a 1-line paragraph could exist only when surrounded by other paragraphs, as long as some of those other paragraphs take up more than one line (without linebreaks). of course this all depends on the width of the page. i should also mention that if you make the page so narrow that there's only 1 word per line, that also doesn't count as a paragraph because it becomes a word list. but as long as at least one line is wide enough for 2 words, then it becomes a paragraph again

11.27.23  6:25 pm   if persons A and B have the same birthday then clearly that's 1 coincidence.

     it's not entirely clear to me

     meanwhile if persons A and B have the same birthday, and persons C and D have a different same birthday, then that's 2 coincidences. but say persons A, B, and C have the same birthday. are there 2 coincidences in this situation, or 3?

      i'm trying to figure out just what we normally mean when we say 'coincidence'. it seems like, for compounding coincidences, it seems like the results have to be revealed separately. if you select 3 random numbers at the same time, and they are all the same number, that seems like 1 coincidence. however, if you select the 3 numbers one at a time, and they all turn out the same, then that would feel like 2 coincidences, because effectively your were surprised twice

11.27.23  6:13 pm   how to calm down over things beyond my control

      figure out what is in your control. there will be plenty of time to worry about the things you can't control, later, after you figure out what you can control

11.27.23  5:53 pm   What is love?

      more than what

11.27.23  5:10 pm   When is an appropriate time to toast the bread?

      right away

11.27.23  5:00 pm   am i a frog

      i doubt it

      equally much. only for fiction

11.27.23  4:37 pm   What is your favorite font? Why?

      i'm currently in between favorite fonts

11.27.23  4:25 pm   what if we created another universe

      who

11.27.23  4:01 pm   why are there so many musicals written about musicals,

     maybe it's the main thing musical writers know about

     and why do they all seem so much weaker than musicals not written about musicals?

     i don't know. i would expect that musical musicals would naturally be very strong. but maybe i'm part of the problem

11.27.23  10:58 am   Thoughts on the music in the Tom & Jerry cartoons? 

      legit

11.27.23  10:41 am   Have you decided which video will be the next video?

      no. for a long time i was certain that i was going to start with the first in the production list, but recently i've been toying with other choices

11.27.23  8:48 am   I like it that an answer somehow achieves it's own flavour and meaning when it comes from a certain person, their doesn't have to be anything special about that person, but it's something unique about that person that makes what they say seem so powerfully something (it's especially from people you seem to have a great understanding in) - it's something I noticed when you give really short answers to questions, or reallyseemingly simple ones, it's not only the text - there's also the fact thatyou're saying it ("it's funny because I get what you mean by that" I sometimes think). And I also realised just now that that could apply to everything, and there's so many inaccessible layers to people's art or what they say that I'll never get, but it somehow is still able to touch me so deeply -or the opposite of that case where people want to let you in to help you understand them better - and layers are neither opaque nor transparent, there's a spectrum of openness and closed ness and it's pretty darn crazy I have to say

     i see

11.27.23  8:39 am   how long will the next video be?

      between 1 and 12 minutes

11.27.23  8:39 am   does the universe have a point?

      every person, every thing, every moment, are all very important points of the universe

11.27.23  7:37 am   Is normality even a thing?

      it's planned to become a thing

11.27.23  4:49 am   what are your favorite types of questions here?

      the best type is when it doesn't fit into any of the pre-existing categories of types. although i should mention that all the most common ways of trying to evade a category are already a category

11.27.23  4:13 am   how do i force myself to do unfun tasks that are neccesary for school??

      you'd have to either really really desire the positive consequences of doing it, or really really fear the consequences of not doing it. but just to backpedal a bit, there are other ways to get it done besides force

11.27.23  1:44 am   have you ever started writing a song with an initial concept then find it slowly spiral out into another concept in the process of writing and assembling?

     no, it spirals quickly and suddenly, to uproot any existing process that may have been going on before

     (by the way, yor songs do bring me good thoughts and emotions).
